name: Pet Kick Up - Top Sports Game with Cute Friends
name_original: Pet Kick Up - Top Sports Game with Cute Friends
description:
Save really cute pets from exploding. By kicking them up!

Your pets have a strange wish… They wish to fly! Show your love and help them by mercilessly kicking them up to outer space! How do you do that? Well, keep collecting coins during the game and will be able to unleash the mother of all kicks: the Superkick! You'll give your pets a trip they won't forget.

While you're at it, use those coins to buy new pets like hippo and the pig or customize them with hats, boots, socks, costumes and more! It doesn't stop there, though: awesome characters and levels are waiting for you to unlock!

Use power ups, do giant combos and beat the highscores! Are you the best kicker around? Find out!


Features:
• The best pet kicking game on the App Store
• Simple and addictive mechanics: everyone can play it!
• 3 cool characters and 7 different pets!
• Customize them: 18 unique clothes!
• 3 levels: Sunny Park, Tropical Beach and Snowy Hills
• 3 characters: Zack, Zoey and the legendary Lepe
• Beautiful graphics
• Amazing audio
• Compare your standings with your friends
• Complete integration with Game Center
• Free updates

Have fun!

Get it WHILE IT'S FREE!
